data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Suphan Buri to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Suphan Buri, Thailand
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: the state of Suphan Buri has (about) 5,613 people who know Jesus, 5,730 people who know about him culturally, and 856,757 people who are far from Jesus.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 154 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Suphan Buri. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 856,757, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, fill the 5,613 believers in the state of Suphan Buri with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Suphan Buri, Thailand that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Spirit, sanctify the 5,613 believers in Suphan Buri and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.
